name: propositional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to statements or problems that must be solved or proved to be true or not true: The second chapter introduces propositional logic. It doesn't mean anything because it doesn't have any propositional content.
More examplesFewer examplesA symptom can be True, False, or Unknown. It can be represented by a propositional formula.Our interest is in formulae with very few propositional variables.The propositional schema "x is a man" can be appropriately filled in by inserting a proper name, say "Jones".
